hadiths.text: Ibrahim bin Jarir narrated that his father said:"I was with the Prophet (ﷺ) and he went to Al Khala' (toilet) and relieved himself, then he said: "O Jarir, bring Tahur (a means of purification)." So I brought him some water and he performed Intinja' with water, and did like this with hand, rubbing it on the ground. Abu 'Abdur-Rahman (An-Nasa'i) said: "This resembles more with what is correct than the (previous) narration of Sharik, and Allah knows best

chapter.ara-name: باب دَلْكِ الْيَدِ بِالأَرْضِ بَعْدَ الاِسْتِنْجَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: Rubbing The Hand On The Ground After Istinja'
